info.title: WHO Vaccine PreQual DB API
info.description:
WHO Vaccine PreQual DB.  Logical model for WHO PreQual DB as CSV file available at:
     https://extranet.who.int/prequal/vaccines/prequalified-vaccines
Columns of the CSV are as follows
  1:Date of Prequalification  
  2:Vaccine Type
  3:Commercial Name
  4:Presentation
  5:No. of doses
  6:Manufacturer
  7:Responsible NRA

get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-PreQualDB
get.description: This endpoint serves the JSON Schema definition for the Logical Model StructureDefinition-PreQualDB.
